content: A tired office worker sits alone at his desk late at night, printing documents on a copier.
The man notices a mysterious black circular hole has appeared on one of the printed pages.
He picks up the page and examines the black hole, which appears to be a physical void on the paper.
Curious, the man tests the hole by pushing his finger through it, discovering it's a portal.
He pushes his entire hand through the black hole, confirming it can penetrate solid objects.
The man realizes the black hole can be used to reach through surfaces. He tests it on his desk.
He places the page with the black hole on the vending machine and reaches through to grab a snack.
The man places the black hole page on the office safe, planning to reach inside.
He reaches through the black hole into the safe and retrieves stacks of money.
Greed takes over. The man decides to climb through the black hole himself to get more money.
He attempts to crawl through the black hole, but it's too small for his body.
The man tries to force himself through the black hole, pushing harder.
The black hole begins to stretch and deform as the man forces his way through.
The man gets stuck halfway through the black hole, trapped between dimensions.
The black hole collapses, leaving the man permanently trapped, with only his legs visible on the office floor.
